message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $14,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price, but I believe my initial offer was more in line with the true value of this product. I could meet you halfway â€“ how about $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $12,500. Would you be willing to consider that price?
